00028 namespace Hypertable {
00029   using namespace Serialization;

00031   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_create_table_request(const char *tablename, const char *schemastr) {
00032     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_MASTER);
00033     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + encoded_length_vstr(tablename) + encoded_length_vstr(schemastr));
00034     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_CREATE_TABLE);
00035     cbuf->append_vstr(tablename);
00036     cbuf->append_vstr(schemastr);
00037     return cbuf;
00038   }
00039 
00040   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_get_schema_request(const char *tablename) {
00041     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_MASTER);
00042     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + encoded_length_vstr(tablename));
00043     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_GET_SCHEMA);
00044     cbuf->append_vstr(tablename);
00045     return cbuf;
00046   }

00048   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_status_request() {
00049     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_MASTER);
00050     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2);
00051     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_STATUS);
00052     return cbuf;
00053   }
00054 
00055   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_register_server_request(const String &location) {
00056     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_MASTER);
00057     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + encoded_length_vstr(location));
00058     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_REGISTER_SERVER);
00059     cbuf->append_vstr(location);
00060     return cbuf;
00061   }
00062 
00063   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_report_split_request(TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log_dir, uint64_t soft_limit) {
00064     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_MASTER);
00065     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + table->encoded_length() + range.encoded_length() + encoded_length_vstr(transfer_log_dir) + 8);
00066     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_REPORT_SPLIT);
00067     table->encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00068     range.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00069     cbuf->append_vstr(transfer_log_dir);
00070     cbuf->append_i64(soft_limit);
00071     return cbuf;
00072   }
00073 
00074   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_drop_table_request(const char *table_name, bool if_exists) {
00075     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_MASTER);
00076     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 3 + encoded_length_vstr(table_name));
00077     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_DROP_TABLE);
00078     cbuf->append_bool(if_exists);
00079     cbuf->append_vstr(table_name);
00080     return cbuf;
00081   }
00082 
00083   CommBuf *MasterProtocol::create_shutdown_request() {
00084     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_MASTER);
00085     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2);
00086     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_SHUTDOWN);
00087     return cbuf;
00088   }

00090   const char *MasterProtocol::m_command_strings[] = {
00091     "create table",
00092     "get schema",
00093     "status",
00094     "register server",
00095     "report split",
00096     "drop table",
00097     "shutdown"
00098   };
00099 
00100   const char *MasterProtocol::command_text(short command) {
00101     if (command < 0 || command >= COMMAND_MAX)
00102       return "UNKNOWN";
00103     return m_command_strings[command];
00104   }
